did.head: Overview
did.abstract: Professional papers include correspondence, publications, lecture notes, and essays; correspondents include Walter Van Dyke Bingham, Edwin G. Boring, Leonard Carmichael, Ralph E. Cleland, Florence L. Goodenough, Alfred C. Kinsey, D. Elton Trueblood, Ray Lyman Wilbur, Robert M. Yerkes, and Mary Yost. Personal papers include biographical and genealogical notes, family reminiscences, reminiscences of his World War I military service, letters to his family while on sabbatical in England and Europe, transcripts and essays from his schooling, and obituaries and memorials.
